description: TO ELECT A SPEAKER OF THE HOUSE FOR THE 57TH CONGRESS VOTES FOR HENDERSON (REP) ARE CODED 2, FOR RICHARDSON (DEM) ARE CODED 1, FOR STARK, 5, AND FOR CUMMING, 6.

TO RECOMMIT TO THE COMMITTEE ON JUDICIARY WITH INSTRUCTIONS S. 3653, A BILL PROVIDING FOR THE PROTECTION OF THE PRES. THE INSTRUCTIONS ARE TO REPORT SAME BACK AMENDED BY STRIKING OUT SECTION 3 WHICH IMPOSES A DEATH PENALTY UPON ANYONE WHO KILLS AN AMBASSADOR OR MINISTER OF A FOREIGN COUNTRY, AND SECTION 13 WHICH PRESUMES FOR THE PURPOSES OF THIS ACT THAT THE PRESIDENT, VICE PRESIDENT OR OTHER OFFICER ENTITLED TO SUCCEED TO THE PRESIDENCY IS ENGAGED AT ALL TIMES IN THE PERFORMANCE OF HIS OFFICIAL DUTY; NO QUORUM.  (P. 6474-2)

TO RECOMMIT S. 3653, TO THE COMM. ON THE JUDICIARY, WITH INSTRUCTIONS TO STRIKE SECTIONS 3 AND 13.  SECTION 3 IMPOSES DEATH PENALTY ON ANYONE WHO KILLS AN AMBASSADOR OR MINISTER OF FOREIGN COUNTRY, AND SECTION 13 PROVIDES THAT FOR THE PURPOSES OF THIS ACT, THE PRESIDENT AND THOSE ENTITLED TO SUCCEED HIM, ARE AT ALL TIMES ENGAGED IN PERFORMANCE OF OFFICIAL DUTIES.  (P. 6474-2)
